title: Energy forms - objects 1 and 2 connected by spring

content.question: For the system consisting of only Block <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"> <mn>1</mn> </math>, what forms of mechanical energy are present in the system and what reasoning supports the claim?

choices.label: Kinetic energy only because Block <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> is moving relative to Block <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>.
Kinetic energy only because Block <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> is in motion but has no internal parts that can interact with each other.
Kinetic energy and elastic potential energy because both blocks are in motion and the spring length is changing.
Kinetic energy and elastic potential energy because Block <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> is in motion and the spring exerts an external force on it.

content.answer: Kinetic energy only because Block <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> is in motion but has no internal parts that can interact with each other.
